# llms.txt
# Get Ahead Shot Photography - Professional Headshot Photography in Washington DC

# Site Information
Site Name: Get Ahead Shot Photography
Description: Washington DC's premier headshot photographer. Magazine-quality professional headshots for executives, entrepreneurs, and business professionals. Same-day turnaround available.
Business Type: Professional Photography Services - Specializing in Corporate Headshots
Location: Washington DC Metro Area
Website: https://photography-website-9i18mag4t-kevin-elwells-projects.vercel.app

# Services Offered
- Professional headshots for executives and business professionals
- Corporate photography
- LinkedIn profile photos
- Business portraits
- Executive portraits
- Group headshots
- Event photography
- Same-day turnaround available

# Target Audience
- Executives
- Entrepreneurs
- Business professionals
- Corporate teams
- Job seekers
- Personal branding professionals

# Key Pages
## Main Navigation
- Home: / - Primary landing page with hero message about professional image
- About: /about - Photographer background and expertise
- Pricing: /pricing - Service packages and rates
- Gallery: /gallery - Portfolio of professional headshots
- Contact: /contact - Booking and inquiry form

## Additional Pages
- Schedule: /schedule - Book a session
- Articles: /articles - Photography tips and industry insights
- Events: /events - Group headshot events
- Consultation: /consult - Pre-session consultation booking
- Preparation: /prep - How to prepare for your headshot session
- Group Sessions: /groups - Information about group photography sessions

# Business Philosophy
In a digital world, your headshot is your first impression. Professional photography that makes a powerful statement and opens opportunities.

# Value Propositions
- Magazine-quality professional headshots
- Same-day turnaround available
- Expertise with executives and business professionals
- Washington DC premier headshot photography service
- Professional image consulting

# Contact & Booking
Website: https://photography-website-9i18mag4t-kevin-elwells-projects.vercel.app
Primary CTA: Schedule a headshot session
Contact Page: /contact
Scheduling Page: /schedule

# Technical Details
Platform: Next.js (React framework)
Deployed on: Vercel
Content Management: Markdown files with frontmatter
Image Optimization: Next.js Image component with Vercel Blob storage

# Keywords & SEO Focus
- professional headshots
- Washington DC headshots
- corporate photography
- business portraits
- LinkedIn headshots
- headshot photographer DC
- executive portraits
- professional photography DC

# Content Strategy
Focus on demonstrating how professional headshots impact career success and business opportunities. Emphasis on quality, professionalism, and results-oriented photography for business professionals.
